pullrequest.title: Back port the memory out-of-bound access issue for joint cfm

content.raw:
I think that's fine. There is extra checking done in [dxJoint::addLimot](#!/osrf/gazebo/src/72b6362b00b0ad5ef316845c28dba69c24a51bea/deps/opende/src/joints/joint.cpp?at=default#joint.cpp-573) to see if the joint is powered or has limits. The logic is implemented separately from the logic in getInfo1, but it should be equivalent.

So I think the specific line that you mentioned is fine.
content.html:
I think that's fine. There is extra checking done in dxJoint::addLimot to see if the joint is powered or has limits. The logic is implemented separately from the logic in getInfo1, but it should be equivalent.

So I think the specific line that you mentioned is fine.
